attributes.action: end the employment of Ralph Seymour-Jackson, chief executive of the Student Loans Company.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the press consistently reporting on the thousands (estimates in the region of 70,000) of students who are yet to receive any financial support from the Student Loans Company (SLC) and with recent reports of 43 universities paying out increased volumes of hardship funds (an average of £44,000) due to the failure of the loans system, the dismissal of the CE is long overdue.

Ralph Seymour-Jackson has not only presided over a system that has failed with such magnitude and brought distress to many young people embarking on new chapters in their lives, but also what simply amounts to a supreme embarrassment of our much credited and world-class higher education system.

It is time for him to exit with immediate effect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
